name: Uma
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Alhamdulillah! Many many happy wishes..
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishText: Semoga senantiasa diberi umur yang barokah, senantiasa sehat, lancar segala urusan, dimudahkan segala keinginannya. Aamiin.
outroText: Thanks for being the best uma for our family.
